column3: str
Laxio of Little Solace remains unconvinced of your intentions.
Laxio demands that you obey his every command as proof that you are a friend to the sylphs. First, /poke his back to scratch an itch.
By touching Laxio, you have been afflicted with a sylphic curse that turns one's skin to moss. /examineself and ascertain its dire effect.
The curse was a lie; Laxio was only fooling you. Express your adulation and /congratulate him on his brilliant ruse.
Your sense of humor pleases Laxio, who now welcomes you to Little Solace with wings outspread.
/poke Laxio.
/examineself before Laxio.
/congratulate Laxio.
Walking one may dance many dances, but this one still doesn't like walking ones! Why? Because walking ones don't listen! That's why!

If walking one wants to be friend to this one, walking one should listen, and listen good! This one has itchy spot on back. Walking one should <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>poke<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> it.

This one has itchy spot on back. Walking one should <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>poke<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> it. And not too hard! This one has sensitive fibers.
Tee hee! Walking one fell into trap! Touching this one turns walking ones' skin into moss!

Tee hee! Mossy one's skin turns greener and greener! Mossy one should <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>examine self<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> to see how silly mossy one has become!
Do walking one's ears not hear? This one said walking one should <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>poke<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> this one's back!
Tee hee! Mossy one's skin turns greener and greener! Mossy one should <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>examine self<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>!
Hee hee hee! Walking one is so silly! There is no curse, silly one!

This one tricked silly one good, yes? This one is smart. Silly one should <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>congratulate<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> this one for being so very smart.

Does walking one's brain turn to moss, too? This one said mossy one should <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>examine self<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>. What is mossy one waiting for?
This one is smart. Silly one should <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>congratulate<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> this one for being so very smart.
That's right, silly one! This one is very, very smart one. Silly one is smart to know this.
Silly one makes this one laugh. This one likes to laugh. Maybe silly one is not so bad, after all.

Silly one is no fun! This one tricked silly one. Silly one should <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>congratulate<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> this one for being so very smart.
